cast.name: 蓝蓝琳·德加莎·维 Lanlalin Tejasa Weckx
拉甘娜芃·柄固纳芘楠 Rattanapond Klinkulabhiran
杰克里特·阿玛纳特  Jakkrit Ammarat
普拉奇·西拉瓦纳东 Prach Siravanadorn

this_title: พิศวาสข้ามภพ
introduction: 这是一个关于王塔基安村的故事。在那里，一位名叫普雷通的美丽女子在被迫嫁给波隆后，与她的情人穆恩·希里私奔了。然而，他们被Praethong追赶并抓住，prae thong在盛怒之下杀死了Meun Khiri。在目睹了爱人的死亡后，Praethong自杀了。这对死去的恋人被一起埋葬在一棵羚牛树下。数百年过去了，然而，Praethong不能进入自杀导致的轮回。相反，她成了Wangtakhian的母亲，Wangtakhian是一个受村民尊敬的实体。她现在所能做的就是等待再次见到她的爱人穆恩·希里。This is the story of Wang Takian village, where a beautiful woman called Praethong once eloped with her lover Muen Khiri, after being forced to marry Phloeng. However, they were chased and caught by Praethong, who in his rage killed Meun Khiri. Having witnessed the death of her lover, Praethong committed suicide. The two dead lovers were buried together under a Takian tree.Hundreds of years passed, however, Praethong could not enter the rebirth cycle due to committing suicide. Instead, she became the mother of Wangtakhian, an entity revered by the villagers. All she could do now was wait to meet her lover Muen Khiri again.
foreign_title: พิศวาสข้ามภพ
